force:cmdt:create.description: Creates a new custom metadata type in the current project
examples:
$ sfdx force:cmdt:create --devname Country
    Created custom metadata type with developer name "Country", label "Country", plural label "Country", and visibility "Public".

$ sfdx force:cmdt:create --devname CustomType --label "Custom Type" --plurallabel "Custom Types" --visibility Protected --outputdir force-app/main/default/object
    Created custom metadata type with developer name "CustomType", label "Custom Type", plural label "My Custom Metadata Type", and visibility "Protected".

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

plurallabel.name: plurallabel
plurallabel.description: Plural label for the type. If blank, uses label

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.description: Visibility for the type. Valid values are 'Public' and 'Protected'. If blank, uses 'Public'

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory to store the newly created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

force:cmdt:generate.description: generates a custom metadata type and all its records for the provided sobject
examples:
"$ sfdx cmdt:generate ---devName ConfigObjectmeta --label Config Object meta --plurallabel Config Object meta --sobjectname ConfigObject__c   --sourceusername SourceOrg
  Congrats! Created a ConfigObjectmeta__mdt type with 32 records!"

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

devname.name: devname
devname.description: The name of the new Custommetadata Type. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

label.name: label
label.description: The label of the new Custommetadata Type.

plurallabel.name: plurallabel
plurallabel.description: The plural label of the new Custommetadata Type. If blank, uses label

visibility.name: visibility
visibility.description: Visibility for the type. Valid values are 'Public' and 'Protected'. If blank, uses 'Public'

sobjectname.name: sobjectname
sobjectname.description: The sObject name you are generating to Custommetadata

sourceusername.name: sourceusername
sourceusername.description: username or alias for the source org that contains the Custom Setting or SObject and data to be generateed

deploy.name: deploy
deploy.description: Runs the force:source:push command after Source XML is created

ignoreunsupported.name: ignoreunsupported
ignoreunsupported.description: Flag to ignore non-supported field types (these fields will not be created)

force:cmdt:field:create.description: generates a custom metadata field based on the field type provided
examples:
$ sfdx force:cmdt:field:create --fieldname MyCheckbox --fieldtype Checkbox
    Created custom metadata field called MyCheckbox.

$ sfdx force:cmdt:field:create --fieldname Picklist --fieldtype Picklist --picklistvalues A,B,C --outputdir force-app/main/default/objects/CustomMetadate__mdt
    Created custom metadata field called Picklist.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

fieldtype.name: fieldtype
fieldtype.description: The type of field that you are creating

picklistvalues.name: picklistvalues
picklistvalues.description: List of picklist values that are added when creating a picklist

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: The directory to store the newly created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

force:cmdt:record:create.description: Creates a new record for a given custom metadata type in the current project
examples:
$ sfdx custommetadata:record:create --typename MyCMT --recname MyRecord
    Created custom metadata record of the type "MyCMT" with record developer name "MyRecord", label "MyRecord", and visibility "Public".

$ sfdx custommetadata:record:create --typename MyCMT --recname MyRecord --label "My Record" --protected true
    Created custom metadata record of the type "MyCMT" with record developer name "MyRecord", label "MyRecord", and visibility "Protected".

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

typename.name: typename
typename.description: DeveloperName of the type to create a record for

protection.name: protection
protection.description: Visibility for the record. If blank, uses false

inputdir.name: inputdir
inputdir.description: Specify the directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')

outputdir.name: outputdir
outputdir.description: Specify the directory where the file will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')
